benefits.title: Welcome Benefits
benefits.description: Complimentary Club Marriott membership for first year. Welcome benefit of 12,500 reward points on fee realization and card activation.

benefits.title: Travel Benefits
benefits.description: Book stay for 3-nights & pay for 2 at participating ITC hotels. Unlimited complimentary global airport lounge access for primary and add-on cardholders.

benefits.title: Lifestyle Benefits
benefits.description: Unlimited Complimentary Global golf lessons & games. 24 x 7 Global Personal Concierge for customized bookings & assistance.

benefits.title: Reward Benefits
benefits.description: Earn 5 Reward Points on every Rs.150 spent. Earn up to 10x Reward Points on Smartbuy spends.

benefits.title: Dining Benefits
benefits.description: 1+1 buffet at participating ITC hotels. Up to 25% discount on Dining & stay across Asia-Pacific with Complimentary Club Marriott Membership.

benefits.title: Unlimited Domestic & International Lounge Access
benefits.description: Unlimited complimentary Domestic airport lounge access in India and unlimited complimentary International airport lounge access outside India via Priority Pass.

benefits.title: Golf Benefits
benefits.description: Unlimited Complimentary Golf lessons & games at leading courses across India and select courses across the world. 100% green fee waiver at select golf courses worldwide.

benefits.title: 24x7 Global Personal Concierge
benefits.description: Customized bookings & assistance for travel, dining, events, and more.

benefits.title: Insurance Benefits
benefits.description: Accidental Air Death cover worth Rs. 3 Crore. Emergency overseas hospitalization up to Rs. 50 lakhs. Credit Shield Cover for up to Rs. 9 lakhs.

benefits.title: Lowest Foreign Currency Markup
benefits.description: Lowest markup fee of 2% on all foreign currency transactions.

benefits.title: Zero Lost Card Liability
benefits.description: Zero liability on fraudulent transactions in case of card loss, upon reporting.

benefits.title: Fuel Surcharge Waiver
benefits.description: 1% fuel surcharge waiver at all fuel stations across India on transactions between Rs.400 and Rs.1,00,000.
